SMW Subobject for (1)High Alchemy value: 30Buy limit: 2000Examine: A cup of Guthix Rest.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Guthix restImage: File:Guthix rest(1).pngUses infobox: ItemWeight: 0.050Value: 50Version anchor: (1)Release date: 28 February 2005Item ID: 4423

Guthix rest is a tea which functions similar to a potion. Once Sanfew explains how players can make it during the One Small Favour quest, they unlock the ability to consume and make their own, requiring 18 Herblore.

Guthix rest tea is made from 2 Guam leaves, a harralander, and a marrentill. To make it, heat a bowl of water on a range or fire. Use the heated water on an empty tea cup and add any of the herbs to make herb tea mix. Add in the rest of the herbs to make a 3-dose Guthix rest. These can be decanted into 4-dose cups. Making it grants a total of 59 Herblore experience, with 14, 14.5, 15, 15.5 experience granted for the first, second, third, and fourth herbs, respectively. The herbs can be added in any order.

Each dose will:

  • Reduce venom to poison, or reduce poison damage by 1
  • Restore 5% energy
  • Heal 5 hitpoints, which can also boost up to 5 above your HP level if you are at full health.

As it functions as a potion, players can use Guthix rest to heal during combat without delaying their attacks. Despite this, however, the Amulet of chemistry has no effect when making the tea, nor will it consume any charges.

As the player adds the herbs, it creates the unfinished herb tea mix. Adding incorrect herbs produces a ruined herb tea.

Contents

  • 1 Price per Dose
  • 2 Creation
  • 3 Changes
  • 4 Trivia

Creation[edit | edit source]

In total, creation of a Guthix rest(3) gives 59 herblore experience, and costs 1,380, for a net profit of 654.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
15 April 2016
(update)

Half full cups can now be turned into bank placeholders.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • When first released, there was a bug that caused the tea to restore all of the user's hitpoints. The bug was quickly fixed.
  • All doses of Guthix rest appear the same visually.
  • At the Duel Arena, Guthix rest counts as a drink, rather than food.
  • Guthix rest can be used instead of energy potions, if your herblore is too low.
  • If players attempt to make Guthix rest before starting One Small Favour, they will receive a message in their chatbox stating, "You have no idea what effect this would have."
  • Using the herb on the cup/mixture and using the cup/mixture on the herb can produce different chatbox messages:
    • Using the herb on the cup of hot water gives, "You place the [herb] into the cup of hot water."
    • Using the cup of hot water on the herb gives, "You place the [herb] into the steamy mixture." This is the same message as when the second and third herbs are used with the mixture (in either order).
    • Completing the tea by using the herb on the mixture gives, "You place the [herb] into the steamy mixture and make Guthix Rest Tea."
    • Completing the tea by using the mixture on the herb gives, "You place the [herb] into the steamy mixture, you make some Guthix Rest Tea."
    • Ruining the tea by using an incorrect herb gives, "You place the [herb] into the steamy mixture, it ruins the tea."

'''Guthix rest''' is a tea which functions similar to a [[potion]]. Once [[Sanfew]] explains how players can make it during the [[One Small Favour]] [[quest]], they unlock the ability to consume and make their own, requiring 18 [[Herblore]].

Guthix rest tea is made from 2 [[Guam leaf|Guam leaves]], a [[harralander]], and a [[marrentill]]. To make it, heat a bowl of water on a range or fire. Use the heated water on an [[empty cup|empty tea cup]] and add any of the herbs to make [[herb tea mix]]. Add in the rest of the herbs to make a 3-dose Guthix rest. These can be decanted into 4-dose cups. Making it grants a total of 59 [[Herblore]] experience, with 14, 14.5, 15, 15.5 experience granted for the first, second, third, and fourth herbs, respectively. The herbs can be added in any order.

Each dose will:
*Reduce [[venom]] to [[poison]], or reduce poison damage by 1
*Restore 5% [[energy]]
*Heal 5 [[hitpoints]], which can also boost up to 5 above your HP level if you are at full health.

As it functions as a potion, players can use Guthix rest to heal during combat without delaying their attacks. Despite this, however, the [[Amulet of chemistry]] has no effect when making the tea, nor will it consume any charges.

As the player adds the herbs, it creates the unfinished [[herb tea mix]]. Adding incorrect herbs produces a [[ruined herb tea]].

==Price per Dose==
{{Price per dose|Guthix rest}}

==Creation==
In total, creation of a ''Guthix rest(3)'' gives 59 [[herblore]] [[experience]], and costs {{Coins|2*{{GEP|Guam leaf}} + {{GEP|Cup of hot water}} + {{GEP|Harralander}} + {{GEP|Marrentill}}}}, for a net profit of {{Coins|{{GEP|Guthix rest(3)}} - (2*{{GEP|Guam leaf}} + {{GEP|Cup of hot water}} + {{GEP|Harralander}} + {{GEP|Marrentill}})}}.

==Changes==

{{Subject changes footer}}

==Trivia==
*When first released, there was a bug that caused the tea to restore all of the user's hitpoints. The bug was quickly fixed.
*All doses of Guthix rest appear the same visually.
*At the [[Duel Arena]], Guthix rest counts as a drink, rather than food.
*Guthix rest can be used instead of energy potions, if your herblore is too low.
*If players attempt to make Guthix rest before starting One Small Favour, they will receive a message in their chatbox stating, "''You have no idea what effect this would have.''"
*Using the herb on the cup/mixture and using the cup/mixture on the herb can produce different chatbox messages:
**Using the herb on the cup of hot water gives, "You place the [herb] into the cup of hot water."
**Using the cup of hot water on the herb gives, "You place the [herb] into the steamy mixture." This is the same message as when the second and third herbs are used with the mixture (in either order).
**Completing the tea by using the herb on the mixture gives, "You place the [herb] into the steamy mixture and make Guthix Rest Tea."
**Completing the tea by using the mixture on the herb gives, "You place the [herb] into the steamy mixture, you make some Guthix Rest Tea."
**Ruining the tea by using an incorrect herb gives, "You place the [herb] into the steamy mixture, it ruins the tea."
